short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that transforms any website into grayscale, promoting a distraction-free and focused browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Grayscale | MVP" is a browser extension that turns any website into shades of gray. This simple change helps you stay focused by removing colorful distractions, making it easier to concentrate on what's important. Ideal for anyone looking to boost productivity and reduce eye strain, it's a must-have tool for more efficient and comfortable browsing. 

Install it now to transform your online experience into one that prioritizes your focus and well-being.
